page.title: 13Health
page.content: There are no doctors surgeries in the area so most families go to a doctor in Tenbury or to the Leominster Health Centre. At the school we have regular visits from the school doctor,dentist, phisiotherapist,nurse,audiometrician, and optician and specialists such as the pediatrician or the speech therapist may be referred to.The school nurse visits occasionally to check for head lice which in common with other schools we suffer from now and again. The nearest hospital is Leominster Cottage Hospital but for all Xrays and anything but the most minor injuries one must travel to Hereford
